topic.title: Minimum specification
topic.shortdesc: Hardware and software requirements may vary depending on the machine and operating system.

body.p: The minimum hardware specifications to install and effectively operate Couchbase Server are:

ul.li: A block-based storage device (hard disk, SSD, EBS, iSCSI).

body.p: Network file systems such as CIFS and NFS are not supported.
body.note: You can reduce the CPU and RAM resources below the above-specified minimum for development and testing purposes. The specification can be as low as 1GB of free RAM beyond operating system requirements and a single CPU core. However, you must use at least the required minimum specification for production.
